landing.subtitle: Compete with the brightest minds in the Turon International Olympiad. Test your skills in Mathematics and English across multiple challenge levels.
landing.feature_1_desc: Strict time controls to test not just your knowledge, but your speed and precision under pressure.
landing.feature_2_desc: Tailored categories for Junior (5-6), Intermediate (7-8), and Senior (9-11) students to ensure fair play.
landing.feature_3_desc: See where you stand among thousands of other participants across the region with live leaderboards.

about.title: About Turon Olympiad
about.subtitle: Fostering academic excellence and inspiring the next generation of leaders through competitive learning.
about.mission_title: Raising the Bar for Academic Achievement
about.mission_text_1: Turon International Olympiad was founded with a singular purpose: to provide a platform where students can test their knowledge against international standards. We believe that competition, when healthy and fair, drives innovation and personal growth.
about.mission_text_2: Our olympiads are designed not just to test memory, but to challenge critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and practical application of knowledge.

rules.title: Competition Rules
rules.subtitle: To ensure a fair and transparent competition for everyone, please read and adhere to the following rules.
rules.rule_eligibility_desc: Open to students from grades 5 to 11. Participants must register in their respective grade categories.
rules.rule_registration_desc: All participants must create an account and complete the registration fee payment prior to the deadline.
rules.rule_device_desc: A stable internet connection and a working computer or tablet are required. Mobile phones are discouraged for the exam.
rules.format_scoring_val:
+2.5 points for correct answer
0 points for skipped
-0.5 points for wrong answer
rules.format_results_val: Available immediately after submission on your dashboard.
rules.disqualification_text: Turon Olympiad maintains a zero-tolerance policy towards cheating. Immediate disqualification will occur if:
rules.disq_1: Multiple tabs or windows are opened during the exam.
rules.disq_2: Another person is detected in the camera frame (if proctoring is enabled).

board.title: Meet Our Board
board.subtitle: Guided by a diverse team of educators, innovators, and industry leaders committed to academic excellence.
board.member_1_bio: Ph.D. in Mathematics with over 20 years of experience in educational reform and olympiad organization.
board.member_2_bio: A leading expert in curriculum development and international assessment standards.
board.member_3_bio: Ensures the smooth execution of olympiads across all 12 regions of Uzbekistan.
board.member_4_bio: Former IMO Gold Medalist dedicated to crafting challenging and inspiring problems.
board.member_5_bio: Architecting the secure and scalable digital platform that powers our examinations.
board.member_6_bio: Bridging the gap between the administration and the student community.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about the Olympiad? We're here to help. Reach out to our support team.
contact.info_text: Our support team is available Monday through Saturday, 9am to 6pm to assist you with any inquiries.

gallery.title: Event Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Capturing the moments of excellence, dedication, and celebration from our international olympiads.
gallery.empty: No images found in this category.
